item.title: RITSEC CTF - Crypto - Lost In
item.description: Crypto - Lost in - writeup description 324c6e597364696f3259725a6f646d673261453d Bingus sent us this encrypted messagen Can you decrypt? writeup this is the message we got: 324c6e597364696f3259725a6f646d673261453d this looks to be hex let’s translate that hex string to ascii: 2LnYsdio2YrZodmg2aE= The = at the end most probably means that this is base64 If I try to decode this from base64 I get this: عربي١٠١ this is Arabic. Once I try to use google translate to translate this to English I get this:

item.title: RITSEC CTF - Misc - Stegwalk
RITSEC CTF - Misc - Scrumptions Snacks
item.description: Misc - Scrumptions Snacks - writeup description Sheamus the STEGOsaurus is hungry! He’s somewhat secretive about his favorite snack spot, but he’ll gladly share his secret if you say the word: “lunch”. Can you identify the name of Sheamus' favorite food establishment? writeup So I first downlaoded the file ‘stegosaurus.jpg’. Let’s see what we have here: mv ~/Downloads/stegosaurus.jpg . file stegosaurus.jpg stegosaurus.jpg: JPEG image data, JFIF standard 1.01, resolution (DPI), density 168x168, segment length 16, baseline, precision 8, 964x910, components 3 It is a JPEG file so steganography is possible.
